title: Should we increase the minimum age for new Loyalty Staking Program bags?
body:
The minimum age for new loyalty staking bags is currently 4 hours. 
(Minimum Age = The amount of time required after creating a new loyalty staking before individuals can unstake their bag)

As the program is designed to build long term holders and encourage long term holding the team is proposing that we increase the minimum age to a longer duration. (Preferably 7 Days = 1 Week). 

Having a longer locked period has been successful for a variety of other projects the core team has been on. This will help mitigate volatility in as new holders join due to exciting new features are added, minimizing swing trading so our all time highs continue to be even higher, and encourage individuals to learn about the project during the extended locked period to encourage long term holding.
choices: Do not increase the Minimum Age
author: 0xea5708805E8EE6b691edF0ed8484230C7b314dc6
